metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42376 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in Busybox's hush applet leads to denial ofservice when processing a crafted shell command, due to missing validationafter a \x03 delimiter character. This may be used for DoS under very rareconditions of filtered command input.

criterions.comment: busybox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
